Vehicles.VehicleBuildDef.label: Drop Pod
Vehicles.VehicleBuildDef.description:
In GrimWorld 40,000, the Astartes Drop Pod is a symbol of rapid deployment. It's utilitarian in design, with battle scars and chapter-specific icons. Hinged doors guard stasis racks for Astartes weaponry. Upon touchdown, it delivers Space Marines directly into battle, embodying the relentless nature of the Imperium's fight against darkness. 

<color=#bb8f04>Crew:</color> Operator x1, Passenger x3
<color=#bb8f04>Fuel type:</color> Chemfuel
